00009 {

00011     std::map <std::string, ngl::Obj *> ::iterator ge_end   = m_gameentity.end();

00021                                  const std::string &_mesh)
00022 {
00023     ngl::Obj *mesh = new ngl::Obj(_mesh);

00037 ngl::Obj *gameEntities::getGameEntity(std::string _name)
00038 {
00039     std::map <std::string, ngl::Obj *>::const_iterator ge_begin  = m_gameentity.begin();
00040     std::map <std::string, ngl::Obj *>::const_iterator ge_entity = m_gameentity.find(_name);  //name of the game entity
00041     //if it is not the end of the map
00042     if(ge_begin != m_gameentity.end() && ge_entity != m_gameentity.end())
00043     {
00044         return ge_entity->second;  //return the game entity name
00045     }
00046 
00047 }

00049 void gameEntities::draw(std::string _name) const
00050 {
00051     std::map <std::string, ngl::Obj *>::const_iterator ge_begin  = m_gameentity.begin();
00052     std::map <std::string, ngl::Obj *>::const_iterator ge_entity = m_gameentity.find(_name);  //name of the game entity
00053     //if it is not the end of the map
00054     if(ge_begin != m_gameentity.end() && ge_entity != m_gameentity.end())
00055     {
00056         ge_entity->second->draw();
00057     }
